episodios.nome: The Past Is Gone. The Dawn of the New Age!!
When Will He Awaken?!
The Savior Comes from the North!!
The Mysterious Bounty Hunter, Ein! Kenshiro's Head Is Mine!!
Another Art of Assassination! The Imperial Fist of the Source Star Is the Name!!
Rage of the Celestial Emperor! Falco, Obliterate the North Star from Earth!!
The Wrath of the South Star! The Illustrious Harn Brothers!
Ein in Danger! Hands of Evil Reach for His Love!!
Falco, the Brave General of the Source Star! There Lies the Shadow of Raoh...
The Emperor's Cries Echoes Through the Imperial Capital. Falco, Where Have You Gone?
The Celestial Emperor Is Finally Revealed
An Elegy for Ein! Die Bravely than Live Without Honor!
The Fall of the Imperial Capital! Jakoh, You Can Dream in Hell!!
The Ordeal Never Ends! Kenshiro Crosses the Ocean!!
What Awaits on the Continent of Darkness? There Lies the Legendary Land of Asura!!
Good or Evil? The Mysterious North Star Lapis Lazuli Fist Appears!!
Love Is Preached in the Century's End! Her Name Is Leia!!
The General of Asura, Han! The Man Who Stains White Snow into Crimson!!
The Legend of the Savior of Asura! His Name Is Raoh!!
Kenshiro's Secret Is Revealed! The Land of Asura Is His Motherland!!
A Cruel Prophecy! Kenshiro, You Cannot Be the Savior!
Rock, the Hero on Horseback! I Don't Believe in Kenshiro!!
Men Beyond Reasons! The Band of Seven Attacks Kenshiro!!
Rock's Message of Death! Kenshiro, Hang on to Your Friend's Life!!
Announcing the Creator of the New Century! My Name Is Demon Kaioh!!
The Seal of the Devil! 2000 Year Tragedy of the North Star Clan Is Revealed!!
Little Brother Ken in Danger! Hyoh, Open Up Your Kind Soul!
Kenshiro on the Execution Stand! The Heavens Unleash the God of the Sea!
Kaioh's Declaration of Victory! The Phantom of the North Star Attacks!!
A Destined Encounter of Hyoh and Ken! Both Are Yet To Know Their Secrets!!
Kaioh's Evil Decision! Cold Blood Runs Through My Body!!
Kenshiro's Challenge! Never Be Defeated Twice!!
The Tyrant Hyoh and His Sorrowful Aide! Who Will Stop Him Now?!
The Battle of the Blood Brothers! Tears Will Never Return to Hyoh.
The North Star on the Brink of Death! Kaioh Reaches Out for the Celestial Emperor!!
Tearful Reunion of the Brothers! Kenshiro, I've Been Waiting for You!!
Shachi's Battle for Love! Kaioh Will Ridicule with Laughter
The Fall of Shachi, Warrior of Love! Love Is Everything, My Friends!!
Tragic Victim of Love! Kaioh's Foundation of Evil!!
Kaioh's Disgraceful Past! The Heavens Recreate Lin's Destiny!!
The Final Chapter: Three Episodes Remaining! Here Is the 2,000 Year-Old History of the North Star Clan!!
Prologue to the Final Episode! A Third Man Appears to Determine Lin's Fate!!
The Final Episode: Farewell, Kenshiro! Farewell, the Divine Fist of the North Star!!

metadata_completo.sinopse: In the second series after Raoh has been defeated by Kenshiro a new rival appears. The Gentou Kouken warriors. Falco the successor of the Gentou Kouken takes orders from an evil ruler by the name of Jacko. He claims to be the man chosen by the Tentei and issues orders to his subordinates to capture anyone living in order to build up his Imperial Capital. Kenshiro once again rises out of the shadows and puts an end to his tyrannical ways. Amidst the mayhem Lynn gets captured and gets taken to the land of the Shura where only ruthless fighters exist. Now Kenshiro must pursue the captor and defeat the 3 Rasho of the land in order to escape with his life and with Lynn.
